channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: More federal agents head to Minnesota. And, U.S. Figure Skating announces Olympic team
item.description: The Trump administration will send hundreds of additional federal agents to Minnesota. And, here are the figure skaters who will represent Team USA in the Olympics.
item.content:encoded:
The Trump administration will send hundreds of additional federal agents to Minnesota. And, here are the figure skaters who will represent Team USA in the Olympics.

(Image credit: Etienne Laurent)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Who are the figure skaters representing Team USA? Key names and backstories to know
item.description: Sixteen U.S. figure skaters are competing in all four Olympic disciplines: men's, women's, pairs and ice dance. The team includes a mix of seasoned vets, world champions and rising stars.
item.content:encoded:
Sixteen U.S. figure skaters are competing in all four Olympic disciplines: men's, women's, pairs and ice dance. The team includes a mix of seasoned vets, world champions and rising stars.

(Image credit: Brian Munoz)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Marrying for health insurance? The ACA cost crisis forces some drastic choices
item.description: While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies , many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.
item.content:encoded:
While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies , many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.

(Image credit: Anton Pentegov/iStockphoto)
item.dc:creator: Selena Simmons-Duffin

item.title: Exercise is as effective as medication in treating depression, study finds
item.description: New research shows exercise is as effective as medication at reducing symptoms of depression. And you don't need to run a marathon to see benefits. So how much is enough?
item.content:encoded:
New research shows exercise is as effective as medication at reducing symptoms of depression. And you don't need to run a marathon to see benefits. So how much is enough?

(Image credit: Maskot)
item.dc:creator: Allison Aubrey

item.title: How IVF has led to a record number of single moms in their 40s
item.description: Who gets to be a parent has been reshaped by IVF: Single women in their 40s are increasingly opting to become moms.
item.content:encoded: Who gets to be a parent has been reshaped by IVF: Single women in their 40s are increasingly opting to become moms.
item.dc:creator: Pallavi Gogoi

item.title: How to responsibly recycle your children's old toys
item.description: Now that the holiday gift-giving season is over, parents may be looking for ways to recycle or donate their children's old toys. Here's what you need to know about recycling responsibly.
item.content:encoded: Now that the holiday gift-giving season is over, parents may be looking for ways to recycle or donate their children's old toys. Here's what you need to know about recycling responsibly.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: Celebrities wear pins protesting ICE at the Golden Globes
item.description: Some celebrities donned anti-ICE pins at the Golden Globes on Sunday in tribute to Renee Good, who was shot and killed by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer last week in Minneapolis.
item.content:encoded:
Some celebrities donned anti-ICE pins at the Golden Globes on Sunday in tribute to Renee Good, who was shot and killed by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer last week in Minneapolis.

(Image credit: Jordan Strauss/AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Malaysia, Indonesia become first to block Musk's Grok over AI deepfakes
item.description: Malaysia and Indonesia have become the first countries to block Grok, the artificial intelligence chatbot developed by Elon Musk's xAI, after authorities said it was being misused to generate sexually explicit and non-consensual images.
item.content:encoded:
Malaysia and Indonesia have become the first countries to block Grok, the artificial intelligence chatbot developed by Elon Musk's xAI, after authorities said it was being misused to generate sexually explicit and non-consensual images.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Trump threatens 'strong' military action as Iran protest deaths rise
item.description: Hundreds of protesters have been killed in Iran, rights groups say, as President Trump threatened "strong" military action.
item.content:encoded:
Hundreds of protesters have been killed in Iran, rights groups say, as President Trump threatened "strong" military action.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Ruth Sherlock

item.title: Arson engulfs Mississippi synagogue, a congregation once bombed by Ku Klux Klan
item.description: A suspect is charged with arson in a fire that burned through a synagogue in Mississippi. Flames and smoke destroyed its library, housing Torahs.
item.content:encoded:
A suspect is charged with arson in a fire that burned through a synagogue in Mississippi. Flames and smoke destroyed its library, housing Torahs.

(Image credit: Hannah Orlansky)
item.dc:creator: Kristin Wright
